name: Sautéed Squid With Garlic, Chili and Bread Crumbs
keywords: appetizer, side dish, bread crumbs, squid, dairy-free
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 to 2 pounds cleaned squid, in rings (cut tentacles in half if large)
1/2 teaspoon chili flakes, or to taste
About 1 cup freshly toasted coarse bread crumbs

recipeInstructions.text: Put oil in a broad skillet over high heat; a minute later, add squid, salt, pepper and chili flakes; cook, stirring, until squid is opaque, about 60 seconds (do not overcook).
Add garlic, basil and lemon juice and stir for about 30 seconds. Turn off heat, add bread crumbs and serve.
